post_title: Do most hotels close during the winter months?

comments.author: issoequeerabom
comments.body: There are indeed some seasonal hotel, but there are plenty of options open. Depending on your budget.

comments.author: Vast_Decision3680
comments.body:
Maybourne Riviera is open all year round and so is Cap d'Estel. Hotels that close for the winter (like MC Beach Hotel) will already be closed by now, usually they close in October/November. 

I suggest Ceto (the Maybourne Riviera restaurant) for a good restaurant with a view, and I suggest to go for lunch because it's much nicer. You can also go to Mirazur which is owned by the same chef. 

There is also the classic Chevre d'Or, food is kind of classic French and not my favourite for that kind of place, but the views are stunning too.

The Grill in Hotel de Paris has a beautiful view too, especially form the side terrace where you have the private dining room.
